channel.title: Black Mesa Steam version won't start
channel.description: When i try to launch the game i keep getting the error: Game shader 'game_shader_dx9.dll' trying to override a base shader 'BMS_Flare'. I did deleted the free version and reinstalling steam version, it didn't help still getting the same error.

item.title: Black Mesa Steam version won't start
item.dc:creator: Nobody
item.description:
When i try to launch the game i keep getting the error: Game shader ‘game_shader_dx9.dll’ trying to override a base shader ‘BMS_Flare’. I did deleted the free version and reinstalling steam version, it didn’t help still getting the same error.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Steam version won't start
